Load the clinical information from the Excel file 1-s2.0-S0092867420301070-mmc1.xlsx.
Filter _out_ any rows whose Case_excluded value is not 'No' so that only non-excluded cases are considered.
Filter for rows where Histologic_type is 'Serous'.
Compute the arithmetic mean of the Age column for this Serous subset, ignoring missing values.
Report that mean as the average age of patients with serous tumour samples.
